'''1.8-pre2''' is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 25, 2014,<ref>{{Cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140826182410/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-1-8-pre-release-the-bountiful-update/|title=Minecraft 1.8 Pre-release 2 – The Bountiful Update|author=[[Jens Bergensten]]|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

{{fixes|fixedin=1.8-pre2|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|46082|Crashes when populating a chunk with empty (void) columns.
|59566|Realms - error uploading world - Upload Failed! (Reams (404)).

|56551|Item frame cannot be placed or is unusable at certain coordinates/directions.
|57926|Thrown splash potions have the color of water.
|60502|Fire renders incorrectly with a flammable block above and below it.
|62124|Cracks remain on blocks if the mouse is getting moved to or from a chest or a sign.

|64662|<code>java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking entity (Entity Type: Zombie)</code>.
|65580|Armor stands can be set on fire without being destroyed.
|67722|Rideable entities given <code>entitydata</code> will teleport to the void when ridden.
|68718|Placing redstone dust on certain other objects destroy the object.
|68726|Skin is using wrong model.
|68740|Cannot summon fireball/wither skull with/without direction (unable to summon object).

== Trivia ==
* 1.8-pre2 was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
